summary: Teuteburg ENB is a balanced preset that aims to archieve nice visuals in every enviroment and weather.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][b][u][size=5]Teuteburg ENB[/size][/u][/b]


[i]by [color=#ff0000]Chris Kley[/color][/i]





[u][size=4]Installation

[/size][/u][size=3][b]1[/b]. Download [color=#ff0000]v.262 or higher[/color] from here: http://enbdev.com/index_en.html

[b]2[/b]. Unzip the folder and drop the "d3d9.dll" file ( Wrapper Folder ) into the main skyrim folder

[b]3[/b]. Download the ENB

[b]4[/b]. Unzip the folder

[b]5[/b]. Drop the content of the folder into your main skyrim folder

[b]6[/b]. Enjoy


[/size]
[u][size=4]Requirements:

[/size][/u][size=4][size=3]Purity

[color=#cc0000][b]OR[/b][/color]

Vivid Weathers

[font=Georgia][size=4][size=3][color=#cc0000][b]OR[/b][/color][/size][/size][/font]

[font=Georgia][size=4][size=3]Enhanced Lights and FX[/size][/size][/font]
[/size][/size]


[size=4][u]Recommended [/u][/size]

I used these mods while taking screenshots:

Realistic Water Two

Better Female Textures

Blackout - Simply Darker Dungeons

Darker Dungeons for ENB

Enhanced Vanilla Trees

Farmhouse Chimneys

Fences of Skyrim

Obsidian Mountain Fogs

Real Roads

Rustic Windows

Verdant



[u][size=4]Credits

[/size][/u][size=4][size=3][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10932083]missisleblanc[/url] for the DoF[/size][/size][size=3] 
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54553?tab=posts
[/size]
wolfgrimdark for his kind help and support

ista3 / Zekerriya for testing

Boris for his amazing work with the ENB's

Bethesda for Skyrim[/font]


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/91286/91286-1526410707-1750682305.jpeg[/img]

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/91286/91286-1526056775-1443930455.jpeg[/img]﻿
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/91286/91286-1526056898-2047792983.jpeg[/img]﻿[/center]
author: ChrisKley

files.name: Teuteburg ENB
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed indoor fog
Fixed indoor fog brightness
Overhauled interior lightning
Fixed lens effect in- and outdoors
Tweaked the sunrays, sunbrightness, ect
Tweaked brigthness and lightning during nighttime
